Quasar:




Quasar eyed Omnious. "Slag no!" The spider legs mounted behind her 
arms shifted, and a click was heard from them. She fired the bullets 
like machine guns, rapidly and non-stop.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Hell Beast thought about Shockwave. Could he be trusted? 
Probly...after 
> all he did know him from a long time ago. "Alright Shockwave. You 
can enter 
> the Ice Cave. Ill bring down the defences when you arrive."
> 
>     Black Aracnia looked to Quickstrike. This was goodbye, at least 
for a 
> little while. Her optics began to flood, and the cold tears ran 
down her 
> face. 
>     "Ill miss you big guy. But, youre right. Ill be fine and so 
will Quasar. 
> I guess you had better get going then..." She paused.
>     And turned and began to walk away. Then, she suddenly turned 
around, "And 
> remember, if you as so much look at that horse I will make sure you 
will 
> never bear offspring agian!" She joked, with a smile. 
> 
>     Ominous looked at Quasar. "Ready to cooperate, or should I show 
you the 
> extent of the Energonian abilities?"
